alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:54AM EDT until April 13 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport, Hazleton, and Petersburg. .Lowland, minor flooding continues along lower portions of the Wabash and White Rivers. With dry weather expected for at least several days, the existing flooding is expected to end over the weekend for most locations, but continue until Tuesday next week at Mount Carmel, and near the end of next week at Hazleton. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, County Road 250 West from State Road 56 floods and blocks the vehicle access to Dodge City. During the March 2008 flood the river remained above this level from late afternoon March 19 through April 9. As mid-March 2011 high water was receding...SR 257 south of Washington reopened when Shoals was at 10.5 feet and falling steadily for the past 2 days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EDT Saturday /10:30 AM CDT Saturday/ the stage was 20.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM EDT Saturday /10:30 AM CDT Saturday/ was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by 11pm Saturday night.
